item.title: Hunter Codefest 2020
item.description: Two of the challenges faced by young computer science students are finding the time to build independent projects for their portfolios and getting feedback from and networking with tech professionals. Enter Hunter Codefest 2020 <p> <style> </p> <p> .row {Having seen what </p> <p> display: flex; </p> <p> } </p> <p> .column { </p> <p> flex: 33.33%; </p> <p> padding: 5px; </p> <p> } </p> <p> .flip { </p> <p> -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg); </p> <p> -moz-transform: rotate(180deg); </p> <p> -o-transform: rotate(180deg); </p> <p> -ms-transform: rotate(180deg); </p> <p> transform: rotate(180deg); </p> <p> } </p> <p> </style> </p> <p> <div class="row"> </p> <p> <div class="colunm flip"> <img src="http:/img/codefest2020/codefest.
